user.title: Connect to Hisense AC
user.description:
Choose your authentication method:

• Manual: Copy/paste callback URL (works with any HA URL)
• Automatic: Requires homeassistant.local to resolve

Application ID: {app_id}

manual_auth.title: Manual Authentication - Step 1/2
manual_auth.description:
**IMPORTANT: Open this URL in your browser (copy & paste it):**

{auth_url}

**Then:**
1. Log in with your Hisense ConnectLife credentials
2. After login, copy the FULL callback URL from your browser address bar (it will start with http://homeassistant.local...)
3. Paste that callback URL below and click Submit

data.callback_url: Paste the callback URL from your browser here
